name: King Exit
description: Because of the Great hero Galoluise, demons are all destroyed.For a rookie teenage girl to become the Savior, everyone loved her.Life seemed happy, and the world was as peace as it could ever get.But 3 years later,Hero Galoluise not only have lost her house, her friends and family members were slaughtered.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP 处理器: 1.2 GHz 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
